did.unittitle: University of Connecticut, Senior Survey Records

repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: The collection contains administrative records associated with opinion surveys of seniors conducted by the University on a range of topics including courses, Greek life, housing, and facilities between 1969 and 1975.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The University of Connecticut administered a series of surveys to students during their senior year at the institution to solicit opinions. The surveys were conducted between 1969 and 1975 and covered topics such as courses, faculty, Greek life, living arrangements and campus facilities.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains opinion and experience surveys on a range of topics of interest to the administration.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students, etc.]. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], University of Connecticut, Senior Survey Records. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: [Subjects include: UConn student opinion on women, courses, faculty, class size, Greek life, living arrangements, facilities.]
